column4: Green Left is an anti-capitalist and eco-socialist grouping within the Green Party of England and Wales. It seeks to constitute a network for socialists and other like minded invividuals in the Green Party
column5: whilst acting as an outreach body that will communicate the party's left wing policies to other socialists and anti-capitalists outside the party. It includes some prominent members of the Green Party of England and Wales and held its first meeting on 4 June 2006.[1] Like members of the Alliance for Green Socialism (who choose to organize separately from the Green Party of England and Wales)
column6: Green Left members were early supporters of the Ecosocialist International Network (EIN).
